cont.entity_a: Ruggedness makes it suitable as a backup. Pro body with weather sealing and built-in hand grip.
8fps is impressive for a 10-year-old camera. Fast burst rate.
cont.entity_b: Subsecond latency captures action well. Fast motor drive good for action shots.

cont.entity_a: Build quality is superior compared to Canon Rebel series.
cont.entity_b: High-end capabilities with excellent photo quality. Extremely good quality.

cont.entity_a: Pro autofocus with 45 points and AI SERVO MODE.
Low resolution at 4.2MP but usable for general and close-up photography. Low MP compared to newer models.

Compatibility.comm: Compatible with a wide range of lenses.

cont.entity_b: Ease of use allows more focus on creativity. Easy to use with intuitive controls.
Reliability stands the test of time.
Battery lasts long; additional battery purchased. Excellent battery life.
Does not support 64-bit operating systems. Lacks support for 64-bit operating systems.

cont.entity_a: Not worth $2000 used; better alternatives exist at lower prices.

cont.entity_b: Lacks permanent ISO display in viewfinder and antireflective LCD. Battery compartment door catch is flimsy. Lacks true spot metering and has a loud mirror slap.
Pictures can be dark and dull in basic modes.
